biotools.summary: These models estimate several properties, such as the level of processivity and preference for hemimethylated CpG dyads over unmethylated ones, of DNA methyltransferases from double-stranded binary methylation data. The inference is done by Markov chain Monte Carlo methods under a Bayesian framework.
